text: The movie looks like it will be remarkably faithful to the original as far as tone, if a tad more cliche looking. (If my memory holds true, the original had a grand total of 1 cheap jump scare. I counted at least 4 in this trailer alone.) My issue is the trailer. I'm so tired of seeing the same trailer for every horror movie ever nowadays. They always have the same pacing and the same kind of scenes put in them, regardless of what kind of movie. The trailers more than anything make all horror seem the same. But I could forgive all of this if I never had to hear this sound ever again. 1:04, 1:58, 2:10 2:17
